title: "Biodiversity data, AI combine into one financially lucrative sector: Nature tech"
excerpt: "Biodiversity and land management data gleaned from satellites is indelible to the success of nature tech. High-resolution images captured from the more than 3,000 satellites orbiting Earth can show the destruction of natural resources occurring in real time, such as deforestation."
